entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Tobermory
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:45 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tobermory 08:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
Temperature: 0.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 0.2°C
Wind: ESE 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Showers or drizzle ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming north 30 km/h this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:40 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle changing to 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 06:40 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
